apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss: person, man, dark skin tone emoji portrays a man with rich, deep skin tones, leaning in for a tender kiss.  His lips are softly rounded, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and subtle highlights that convey warmth and affection. The gentle tilt of his head and closed eyes, illuminated by realistic lighting, evoke a feeling of sincere emotion and romantic connection, making it a perfect way to share heartfelt sentiments on Apple devices.
